document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:
New data. Fars province: Mobarakabad to lake Harm road,
N 28 ° 16 ’ 57.8’’
–
E 53 ° 20 ’ 47.9’’
, 3363 ft asl,
4 .v. 2013
; Esfahan: Javinan, Qamsar to Ghohrood road,
N 33 ° 41 ’ 41.7’’
–
E 51 ° 26 ’ 45.9’’
, 6943 ft asl,
9 .v. 2013
, J. Haxaire rec, P. Ducamps det et leg.

Host plants. On turnip (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
), Asteraceae , Brassicaceae , Poaceae ,
Fabaceae (Iranipour 1996 )
, wild Poaceae ,
Trifolium
sp. ( Fabaceae ),
Pistacia
sp. ( Anacardiaceae ),
Triticum
sp. ( Poaceae ),
Rumex
sp. (Polygonacae) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
), barley, clover, broad bean,
Cirsium
sp. ( Asteraceae ), poplar (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
), lucerne (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
;
Askari et al . 2009
;
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 a
;
Sadeghi et al . 2009
;
Khaghaninia et al . 2010 a
, b ,
2011
), alfalfa (
Farshbaf Pour-Abad 2000
;
Khalilzadeh 2008
),
Triticum vulgare
( Poaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ),
Hordeum vulgaris
( Poaceae ),
Salix
sp. ( Salicaceae ),
Urtica
sp.

( Urticaceae ),
Verbascum
sp. ( Scrophulariaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
),
Alhagi
sp. ( Fabaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
;
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
),
Acroptilon repens , Cousinia
sp.,
Taraxacum
sp. ( Asteraceae ),
Alangium
sp. ( Cornaceae ),
Alhagi
sp. ( Fabaceae ),
Atriplex
sp. ( Amaranthaceae ),
Berberis vulgaris
( Berberidaceae ),
Clematis
sp. ( Ranunculaceae ),
Daucus carota
( Apiaceae ),
Erysimum hieraciifolium
( Brassicaceae ),
Gossypium hirsutum
( Malvaceae ),
Kochia
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ),
Medicago
sp. ( Fabaceae ),
Melissa officinalis
( Lamiaceae ),
Scrophularia
sp. ( Scrophulariaceae ),
Solanum tuberosum
( Solanaceae ),
Triticum aestivum
( Poaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
).
